com.team1757.subsystems

Class Vision

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
      • com.team1757.subsystems.Vision
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.NamedSendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable

    public class Vision
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
    Subsystem that contains cameras and ring lights. Interacts with GRIP for vision processing via NetworkTables and has several methods for computing different responses to the GRIP output
    Author:
    Ryan Marten

      • camerasSetFPS

        public void camerasSetFPS(int fps)

        Parameters:
        fps -

      • updateContoursReport

        public void updateContoursReport()
        Updates the local contoursReport table. WARNING, this has to be somewhat syncrhonized so one thing doesn't update the table while another tries to access an element that might not exist in the updated table

      • getContoursCount
